sense.gloss: color scheme, colour scheme, coordination (of colour)
(touch of) colour, embellishment, brilliance, spice, glow, decoration, garnish

sdata.j: いろ|いろ↑努力↑↓どり|ょく↓したにもかかわらず↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑今回↑↓こんかい↓も↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓した。
sdata.e: After all his efforts, he also failed this time.

sdata.j: ↑祖父↑↓そふ↓は、↑晴↑↓は↓れた↑日↑↓ひ↓に↑池↑↓いけ↓の|いろどり|の↑鯉↑↓こい↓を↑眺↑↓なが↓めているのが↑好↑↓す↓きです。
sdata.e: My grandfather likes looking at colorful carp in the pond on a fine day.
